name: v1.9.12: for developers and testers
body:
# Before installing: this might not be the latest release - [you can always get the latest release here](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/releases/latest)

Start by downloading [OpenKneeboard-v1.9.12.msi](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/releases/download/v1.9.12/OpenKneeboard-v1.9.12.msi); the documentation is [on OpenKneeboard.com](https://openkneeboard.com).

## Changes

- üêõ OpenXR+D3D12: fix RAM leak
- üêõ OpenXR+D3D12: fix resources sometimes being freed before a frame has entirely finished rendering
- üêõ Profile switching: fix several issues that could lead to crashes
- üêõ Window capture tabs: fix potential crash when switching profiles immediately after a matching window is created
- ‚ö° Window capture tabs: reduce time for capture to start after a matching window is opened
- ü©π Window capture tab: consistently show 'No pages' message when no matching window, isntead of 'width or hegiht is 0'
- üêõ DirectInput: fix intermittent crash when DirectInput controllers are unplugged
- ü©πüöß: fix dark lines at top/bottom when header or footer are turned of per view. This is fixed for D3D11 and Vulkan, but not yet fixed for D3D12. As a workaround, you can turn off the header and footer for all views in advanced settings instead - [#658](https://github.com/OpenKneeboard/OpenKneeboard/issues/658)
- ‚ú® OpenKneeboard-Viewer: support unscaled rendering - press 'U' to activate
- ü©π OpenXR conformance: return `XR_ERROR_LIMIT_REACHED` instead of `XR_ERROR_RUNTIME_FAILURE` if an `XrSession` is created while another is still active
- ü©π OpenXR conformance: return `XR_ERROR_FUNCTION_NOT_SUPPORTED` for Vulkan functions if the application has not enabled the relevant extensions
- üë∑ Improvements to crash logging and dumps
- üêõ Fix crash if a coroutine throws an exception that should be caught
- üêõ Fix crash if a timer is cancelled after it is created but before it is started
- üêõ Fix crash if Windows returns an error when checking if the DCS saved games folder exists
- üîä Include Windows version and edition (e.g. Home, Pro, Enterprise) in debug logs
- ‚ö°Stopped switching back to original thread for coroutines with discarded results (`fire_and_forget`)
- üêõ Remove assertion if a coroutine is returned on the same thread/COM context, but the thread ID has changed (e.g. for tasks on the windwos thread bool)
- üßë‚Äçüíª Added debug names to various D3D12 resources
- üöß Started replacing WinUI3 with WebView-based UI; 'Developer Tools' settings page is no longer using WinUI

The OpenXR+D3D12 changes primarily improve compatibility with MSFS 2024.

Some bugfixes have not been applied to v1.8 as:
- the bugs are unlikely to cause practical problems for most people
- the fixes depend on invasive changes that carry the risk of reducing overall stability, so for now, are only suitable for test versions
